body: Remember I copy from res/raw not assets. It is faster that way but still suffers from the fact that aapt compresses it.  To get its original size for comparison I have to copy it again which defeats the purpose of this check.  I delete the file at the end.  It is just for safety's sake that the file check is there in case somehow another file got written with the same name. Cache files will be removed eventually anyway.
